name: Solar System (itch) (iKhalidH)
description:
This is my Solar System project. I added the following elements:  

  1. Mercury
  2. Venus
  3. Mars
  4. Jupiter
  5. Saturn
  6. Uranus
  7. Neptune
  8. Pluto

I also modified their positions to reflect the actual solar system.
